## ðŸ“– Books

### **Personal Development**
- **"The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People"** - Stephen Covey
- **"Atomic Habits"** - James Clear
- **"Deep Work"** - Cal Newport
- **"Getting Things Done"** - David Allen
- **"The Power of Now"** - Eckhart Tolle

### **Business & Strategy**
- **"Good to Great"** - Jim Collins
- **"The Lean Startup"** - Eric Ries
- **"Blue Ocean Strategy"** - W. Chan Kim, RenÃ©e Mauborgne
- **"Crossing the Chasm"** - Geoffrey Moore
- **"The Innovator's Dilemma"** - Clayton Christensen

### **AI & Technology**
- **"Hands-On Machine Learning"** - AurÃ©lien GÃ©ron
- **"Deep Learning"** - Ian Goodfellow, Yoshua Bengio, Aaron Courville
- **"Pattern Recognition and Machine Learning"** - Christopher Bishop
- **"The Elements of Statistical Learning"** - Hastie, Tibshirani, Friedman

### **Finance & Investment**
- **"The Total Money Makeover"** - Dave Ramsey
- **"Rich Dad Poor Dad"** - Robert Kiyosaki
- **"The Intelligent Investor"** - Benjamin Graham
- **"A Random Walk Down Wall Street"** - Burton Malkiel

### **Special Needs & Family**
- **"The Special Needs Planning Guide"** - John Nadworny, Cynthia Haddad
- **"Navigating the Special Education System"** - Roger Pierangelo, George Giuliani
- **"The Complete IEP Guide"** - Lawrence Siegel
- **"Special Needs Trusts"** - Stephen Elias, Liza Hanks
